Modification_Detail.description: extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model

Target_PDS3.target_desc:
TARGET PARAMETERS =================
MASS : 1989099999999999887809347321856.00000 TARGET_PARAMETER_UNCERTAINTY : UNK TARGET_PARAMETER_EPOCH : 1989 DATA_SOURCE_ID : PHYSICAL-SUN
MASS_DENSITY : 1.410000 TARGET_PARAMETER_UNCERTAINTY : UNK TARGET_PARAMETER_EPOCH : 1989 DATA_SOURCE_ID : MASS-SUN
EQUATORIAL_RADIUS : 696265.000000 TARGET_PARAMETER_UNCERTAINTY : UNK DATA_SOURCE_ID : EQUATRADIUS-SUN
SURFACE_GRAVITY : 274.000000 TARGET_PARAMETER_UNCERTAINTY : UNK TARGET_PARAMETER_EPOCH : 1989 DATA_SOURCE_ID : SURFGRAV-SUN
POLE_RIGHT_ASCENSION : 286.100000 TARGET_PARAMETER_UNCERTAINTY : UNK TARGET_PARAMETER_EPOCH : 1989 DATA_SOURCE_ID : ROTATION-SUN
POLE_DECLINATION : 63.900000 TARGET_PARAMETER_UNCERTAINTY : UNK TARGET_PARAMETER_EPOCH : 1989 DATA_SOURCE_ID : ROTATION-SUN
SIDEREAL_ROTATION_PERIOD : 25.400000 TARGET_PARAMETER_UNCERTAINTY : UNK DATA_SOURCE_ID : ROTATION-SUN
OBLIQUITY : 7.250000 TARGET_PARAMETER_UNCERTAINTY : UNK DATA_SOURCE_ID : ROTATION-SUN
Data Source Descriptions ========================
EQUATRADIUS-SUN The Astronomical Almanac, 1989, page K7.
MASS-SUN Derived from MASS and EQUATORIAL_RADIUS (ER) as:
MASS_DENSITY = MASS/(1.33 * PI * (ER**3))
PHYSICAL-SUN The 1989 Astronomical Almanac, page K6
ROTATION-SUN The Atronomical Almanac, 1989, page C3
SURFGRAV-SUN Derived from data in the 1989 Astronomical Almanac as:
SURFACE_GRAVITY = (G * MASS)/ (ER*ER)
where EQUATORIAL_RADIUS (ER) and MASS are from this catalog, and the gravitational constant, G, comes from page K6.
